name: What is Cloud Computing
description: Cloud computing is the foundation of modern infrastructure. Learn about IaaS, PaaS, SaaS, and different service models.

learning_steps.title: What is Cloud Computing
learning_steps.description: Learn about IaaS, PaaS, SaaS and the different service models that make up cloud computing.

learning_steps.title: IaaS vs PaaS vs SaaS
learning_steps.description: Dive deeper into the three main cloud service models and when to use each.
The three major cloud providers are AWS (Amazon), Azure (Microsoft), and GCP (Google). You'll choose one to focus on throughout this guide, but the concepts you learn apply to all of them.

questions.prompt: How would you explain cloud computing to a business stakeholder, including its key advantages over on-premises infrastructure?
scenario_seeds: Your CFO asks why the company should move from owning servers to renting cloud resources
A startup founder wants to know if cloud is right for their unpredictable traffic patterns
An executive questions whether cloud is actually cheaper than their current data center
questions.grading_rubric: Must explain cloud computing as on-demand resources over the internet AND cover at least 3 key benefits (scalability, cost model, flexibility, managed services) AND address how it differs from traditional on-premises infrastructure.

questions.prompt: Walk me through IaaS, PaaS, and SaaSâ€”what each provides and give a real-world example of each.
scenario_seeds: Your team needs to decide between managing VMs vs using a managed platform for a new app
A developer asks which cloud service type gives them the most control vs least maintenance
Management wants to understand what level of the stack they're responsible for with each option
questions.grading_rubric: Must correctly define all three service models (IaaS, PaaS, SaaS) AND provide at least one accurate real-world example for each AND explain the responsibility trade-offs between them.

test_knowledge_prompts: Can you ask me what cloud computing is and why companies use it?
Can you quiz me on the differences between IaaS, PaaS, and SaaS with examples?
Can you ask me to name the major cloud providers and one service each offers?
